   Sūtrasthāna	SUtra sTAna
   rāgādi rogān satatānuṣaktān a śeṣa kāya prasṛtān a śeṣān |	rAga Adi  rogAn satata anuzaktAn a Seza kAya  prasRtAn a SezAn |
   autsukya mohā rati dāñ jaghāna yo ' pūrva vaidyāya namo 'stu tasmai || 1	Otsukya  mohA rati dAn jaGAna yaH a pUrva  vEdyAya namaH astu tasmE || 1
   āyuḥ kāmayamānena dharmārtha sukha sādhanam |	AyuH  ka AmayamAnena Darma arTa  suKa  sADanam |
   āyur vedopadeśeṣu vidheyaḥ param ādaraḥ || 2 ||	AyuH  veda upadeSezu viDeyaH param AdaraH || 2 ||
   brahmā smṛtvāyuṣo vedaṃ prajāpatim ajigrahat |	brahmA smRtvA AyuzaH vedam prajApatim ajigrahat |
   so 'śvinau tau sahasrākṣaṃ so 'tri putrādikān munīn || 3 ||	saH aSvinO tO sahasrAkzam saH atri putra AdikAn munIn || 3 ||
   te 'gniveśādikāṃs te tu pṛthak tantrāṇi tenire |	te agniveSa AdikAn te tu pRTak tantrANi tenire |
   tebhyo 'ti viprakīrṇebhyaḥ prāyaḥ sāra taroccayaḥ || 4 ||	teByaH ati viprakIrNeByaH prAyas sAra tara uccayaH || 4 ||
   kriyate 'ṣṭāṅga hṛdayaṃ nāti saṃkṣepa vistaram |	kriyate azwa aFga hRdayam na ati saMkzepa  vistaram |
   kāya bāla grahordhvāṅga śalya daṃṣṭrā jarā vṛṣān || 5 ||	kAya  bAla  graha UrDva aFga   Salya  daMzwrA  jarA  vRzAn || 5 ||
   1.5bv nāti saṃkṣipta vistṛtam	1.5bu na ati saMkzipta  vistRtam
   aṣṭāv aṅgāni tasyāhuś cikitsā yeṣu saṃśritā |	azwO aFgAni tasya AhuH cikitsA yezu saMSritAH |
   vāyuḥ pittaṃ kaphaś ceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ || 6 ||	vAyuH pittam kaPaH ca iti trayaH dozAH samAsatas || 6 ||
   vikṛtā vikṛtā dehaṃ ghnanti te vartayanti ca |	vikRtA  vikRtAH deham Gnanti te vartayanti ca |
   te vyāpino 'pi hṛn nābhyor adho madhyordhva saṃśrayāḥ || 7 ||	te vyApinaH api hRn nAByoH aDas  maDya UrDva  saMSrayAH || 7 ||
   1.7bv ghnanti te vardhayanti ca	1.7bu Gnanti te varDayanti ca

   tair bhaved viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś cāgniḥ samaiḥ samaḥ || 8 ||	tEH Bavet vizamaH tIkzNaH mandaH ca agniH samEH samaH || 8 ||
   koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdur madhyo madhyaḥ syāt taiḥ samair api |	kozWaH krUraH mRduH maDyaH maDyaH syAt tEH samEH api |
   śukrārtava sthair janmādau viṣeṇeva viṣa krimeḥ || 9 ||	Sukra Artava  sTEH janma AdO vizeNa iva viza krimeH || 9 ||
   taiś ca tisraḥ prakṛtayo hīna madhyottamāḥ pṛthak |	tEH ca tisraH prakRtayaH hIna  maDya uttamAH pRTak |
   sama dhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvi doṣa jāḥ || 10 ||	sama DAtuH samastAsu SrezWAH nindyAH dvi da Uza  jAH || 10 ||
   1.10cv sama dhātuḥ samais tāsu	1.10cu sama DAtuH samEH tAsu
   tatra rūkṣo laghuḥ śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaś calo 'nilaḥ |	tatra rUkzaH laGuH SItaH KaraH sUkzmaH calaH anilaH |
   pittaṃ sa sneha tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ laghu visraṃ saraṃ dravam || 11 ||	pittam sa  sneha  tIkzNa uzNam laGu visram saram dravam || 11 ||
   snigdhaḥ śīto gurur mandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ kaphaḥ |	snigDaH SItaH guruH mandaH SlakzNaH mRtsnaH sTiraH kaPaH |

   sapta dūṣyā malā mūtra śakṛt svedādayo 'pi ca || 13 ||	sapta dUzyAH malAH mUtra SakRt  sveda AdayaH api ca || 13 ||
   vṛddhiḥ samānaiḥ sarveṣāṃ viparītair viparyayaḥ |	vRdDiH samAnEH sarvezAm viparItEH viparyayaH |

   ṣaḍ dravyam āśritās te ca yathā pūrvaṃ balāvahāḥ |	zaw dravyam ASritAH te ca yaTA  pUrvam bala AvahAH |
   tatrādyā mārutaṃ ghnanti trayas tiktādayaḥ kapham || 15 ||	tatra AdyAH mArutam Gnanti trayaH tikta AdayaH kaPam || 15 ||
   kaṣāya tikta madhurāḥ pittam anye tu kurvate |	kazAya  tikta  maDurAH pittam anye tu kurvate |
   śamanaṃ kopanaṃ svastha hitaṃ dravyam iti tri dhā || 16 ||	Samanam kopanam svasTa hitam dravyam iti tri DA || 16 ||
   uṣṇa śīta guṇotkarṣāt tatra vīryaṃ dvi dhā smṛtam |	uzNa  SIta  guNa utkarzAt tatra vIryam dvi DA smRtam |
   tri dhā vipāko dravyasya svādv amla kaṭukātmakaḥ || 17 ||	tri DA vipAkaH dravyasya svAdu  amla  kawuka AtmakaH || 17 ||
   guru manda hima snigdha ślakṣṇa sāndra mṛdu sthirāḥ |	guru manda hima  snigDa  SlakzNa   sAndra  mRdu  sTirAH |
   guṇāḥ sa sūkṣma viśadā viṃśatiḥ sa viparyayāḥ || 18 ||	guNAH sa  sUkzma  viSadA viMSatiH sa viparyayAH || 18 ||
   kālārtha karmaṇāṃ yogo hīna mithyāti mātrakaḥ |	kAla arTa karmaNAm yogaH hIna  miTyA ati  mAtrakaH |

   rogas tu doṣa vaiṣamyaṃ doṣa sāmyam a roga tā |	rogaH tu doza vEzamyam doza  sAmyam a roga tA |
   nijāgantu vibhāgena tatra rogā dvi dhā smṛtāḥ || 20 ||	nija Agantu  viBAgena tatra rogAH dvi DA smRtAH || 20 ||
   teṣāṃ kāya mano bhedād adhiṣṭhānam api dvi dhā |	tezAm kAya  mano  BedAt aDizWAnam api dvi DA |
   rajas tamaś ca manaso dvau ca doṣāv udāhṛtau || 21 ||	rajaH tamaH ca manasaH dvO ca dozO udAhRtO || 21 ||
   1.21dv 'tra dvau doṣāv udāhṛtau	1.21du atra dvO dozO udAhRtO
   darśana sparśana praśnaiḥ parīkṣeta ca rogiṇam |	darSana sparSana  praSnEH parIkzeta ca rogiNam |
   rogaṃ nidāna prāg rūpa lakṣaṇopaśayāptibhiḥ || 22 ||	rogam nidAna  prAk  ru upa lakzaNa upaSaya AptiBiH || 22 ||
   1.22bv saṃparīkṣeta rogiṇam 1.22bv parīkṣetātha rogiṇam	1.22bu saMparIkzeta rogiNam 1.22bu parIkzeta aTa rogiNam
   bhūmi deha prabhedena deśam āhur iha dvi dhā |	BUmi deha  praBedena deSam AhuH iha dvi DA |
   jāṅgalaṃ vāta bhūyiṣṭham anūpaṃ tu kapholbaṇam || 23 ||	jAFgalam vAta  BUyizWam anUpam tu kaPa ulbaNam || 23 ||
   sādhāraṇaṃ sama malaṃ tri dhā bhū deśam ādiśet |	sADAraNam sama malam tri DA BU deSam AdiSet |
   kṣaṇādir vyādhy avasthā ca kālo bheṣaja yoga kṛt || 24 ||	kzaNa AdiH vyADi  avasTA ca kAlaH Bezaja  yoga kRt || 24 ||
   śodhanaṃ śamanaṃ ceti samāsād auṣadhaṃ dvi dhā |	SoDanam Samanam ca iti samAsAt OzaDam dvi DA |
   śarīra jānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ krameṇa paramauṣadham || 25 ||	SarIra jAnAm dozANAm krameNa parama OzaDam || 25 ||

   bhiṣag dravyāṇy upasthātā rogī pāda catuṣṭayam |	Bizaj dravyANi upasTAtA rogI pAda  catuzwayam |

   dakṣas tīrthātta śāstrārtho dṛṣṭa karmā śucir bhiṣak |	dakzaH tIrTAt ta  SAstra arTaH dRzwa karmA SuciH Bizaj |
   bahu kalpaṃ bahu guṇaṃ saṃpannaṃ yogyam auṣadham || 28 ||	bahu kalpam bahu guNam saMpannam yogyam OzaDam || 28 ||
   anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣo buddhi mān paricārakaḥ |	anuraktaH SuciH dakzaH budDi  mAn paricArakaH |
   āḍhyo rogī bhiṣag vaśyo jñāpakaḥ sat tva vān api || 29 ||	AXyaH rogI Bizaj  vaSyaH jQApakaH sat tva vAn api || 29 ||
   sādhyo ' sādhya iti vyādhir dvi dhā tau tu punar dvi dhā |	sADyaH a sADyaH iti vyADiH dvi DA tO tu punar dvi DA |
   su sādhyaḥ kṛcchra sādhyaś ca yāpyo yaś cān upakramaḥ || 29+(1) ||	su  sADyaH kRcCra  sADyaH ca yApyaH yaH ca an upakramaH || 29+(1) ||
   sarvauṣadha kṣame dehe yūnaḥ puṃso jitātmanaḥ |	sarva OzaDa kzame dehe yUnaH puMsaH jita AtmanaH |
   a marma go 'lpa hetv agra rūpa rūpo 'n upadravaḥ || 30 ||	a marma gaH alpa  hetu  agra  rUpa rUpaH an upadravaH || 30 ||

   śastrādi sādhanaḥ kṛcchraḥ saṃkare ca tato gadaḥ |	Sastra Adi sADanaH kRcCraH saMkare ca tatas gadaH |
   śeṣa tvād āyuṣo yāpyaḥ pathyābhyāsād viparyaye || 32 ||	Seza tvAt AyuzaH yApyaH paTya aByAsAt viparyaye || 32 ||
   an upakrama eva syāt sthito 'ty anta viparyaye |	an upakramaH eva syAt sTitaH aty anta  viparyaye |
   autsukya mohā rati kṛd dṛṣṭa riṣṭo 'kṣa nāśanaḥ || 33 ||	Otsukya  mohA rati kRt dRzwa  rizwaH akza nASanaH || 33 ||
   tyajed ārtaṃ bhiṣag bhūpair dviṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ dviṣaṃ dviṣam |	tyajet Artam Bizaj  BUpEH dvizwam tezAm dvizam dvizam |
   hīnopakaraṇaṃ vyagram a vidheyaṃ gatāyuṣam || 34 ||	hIna upakaraNam vyagram a viDeyam gata Ayuzam || 34 ||

   tantrasyāsya paraṃ cāto vakṣyate 'dhyāya saṃgrahaḥ || 35 ||	tantrasya asya param ca atas vakzyate aDyAya  saMgrahaH || 35 ||
   āyuṣ kāma dinartv īhā rogān utpādana dravāḥ |	Ayuz  kAma  dina Rtu  i ihA  rogAn  utpAdana dravAH |

   1.38cv sirā vyadhaḥ śalya vidhiḥ	1.38cu sirA vyaDaH Salya  viDiH
   sūtra sthānam ime 'dhyāyās triṃśac chārīram ucyate |	sUtra sTAnam ime aDyAyAH triMSat SArIram ucyate |

   mūtrāghāta pramehāṇāṃ vidradhy ādy udarasya ca |	mUtrAGAta  pramehANAm vidraDi  Adi  udarasya ca |
   pāṇḍu kuṣṭhānilārtānāṃ vātāsrasya ca ṣo ḍaśa || 41 ||	pANxu  kuzWa anila ArtAnAm vAtAsrasya ca zo xaSa || 41 ||
   cikitsitaṃ jvare rakte kāse śvāse ca yakṣmaṇi |	cikitsitam jvare rakte kAse SvAse ca yakzmaNi |

   1.48dv adhyāyo bīja poṣaṇe	1.48dU aDyAyaH bIja  pozaNe

   Sūtrasthāna	SUtra sTAna
   brāhme muhūrta uttiṣṭhet svastho rakṣārtham āyuṣaḥ |	brAhme muhUrte uttizWet svasTaH rakzA arTam AyuzaH |
   śarīra cintāṃ nirvartya kṛta śauca vidhis tataḥ || 1 ||	SarIra cintAm nirvartya kRta SOca  viDiH tatas || 1 ||
   arka nyagrodha khadira karañja kakubhādi jam |	arka nyagroDa  Kadira  karaQja  kakuBa Adi  jam |
   prātar bhuktvā ca mṛdv agraṃ kaṣāya kaṭu tiktakam || 2 ||	prAtar BuktvA ca mRdu  agram kazAya  kawu tiktakam || 2 ||
   kanīny agra sama sthaulyaṃ praguṇaṃ dvā daśāṅgulam |	kanInI  agra  sama  sTOlyam praguNam dvA daSa aFgulam |
   bhakṣayed danta pavanaṃ danta māṃsāny a bādhayan || 3 ||	Bakzayet danta pavanam danta  mAMsAni a bADayan || 3 ||
   2.3cv bhakṣayed danta dhavanaṃ	2.3cu Bakzayet danta Davanam
   nādyād a jīrṇa vamathu śvāsa kāsa jvarārditī |	na adyAt a jIrNa  vamaTu  SvAsa kAsa  jvara arditI |

   sauvīram añjanaṃ nityaṃ hitam akṣṇos tato bhajet |	sOvIram aQjanam nityam hitam akzNoH tatas Bajet |

   2.5dv viśeṣāc chleṣmaṇo bhayam	2.5du viSezAt SlezmaNaH Bayam
   bhukta vāṃś ca śiraḥ snātaḥ śrāntaḥ chardana nāvanaiḥ |	Bukta vAn ca SiraH   snAtaH SrAntaH Cardana  nAvanEH |
   rātrau jāgaritaś cāpi nāñjyāj jvarita eva ca || 5.1+1 ||	rAtrO jAgaritaH ca api na aQjyAt jvaritaH eva ca || 5.1+1 ||
   yojayet sapta rātre 'smāt srāvaṇārthaṃ rasāñjanam |	yojayet sapta  rAtre asmAt srAvaNa arTam rasAQjanam |

   2.6bv srāvaṇārthe rasāñjanam	2.6bu srAvaNa arTe rasAQjanam

   śiraḥ śravaṇa pādeṣu taṃ viśeṣeṇa śīlayet |	SiraH SravaNa  pAdezu tam viSezeNa SIlayet |
   varjyo 'bhyaṅgaḥ kapha grasta kṛta saṃśuddhy a jīrṇibhiḥ || 9 ||	varjyaH aByaFgaH kaPa  grasta  kRta  saMSudDi  a jIrNiBiH || 9 ||
   lāghavaṃ karma sāmarthyaṃ dīpto 'gnir medasaḥ kṣayaḥ |	lAGavam karma  sAmarTyam dIptaH agniH medasaH kzayaH |
   vibhakta ghana gātra tvaṃ vyāyāmād upajāyate || 10 ||	viBakta  Gana  gAtra  tvam vyAyAmAt upajAyate || 10 ||
   vāta pittāmayī bālo vṛddho ' jīrṇo ca taṃ tyajet |	vAta pitta AmayI bAlaH vRdDaH a jIrNaH ca tam tyajet |
   ardha śaktyā niṣevyas tu balibhiḥ snigdha bhojibhiḥ || 11 ||	arDa  SaktyA nizevyaH tu baliBiH snigDa  BojiBiH || 11 ||
   śīta kāle vasante ca mandam eva tato 'nya dā |	SIta kAle vasante ca mandam eva tatas anya dAH |
